metadata.title: HP 2022 Newest Pavilion Laptop, 15.6" Full HD Touchscreen, AMD Ryzen 7 5825U 8-Core Processor, 64GB DDR4 RAM, 2TB PCIe NVMe SSD, Backlit Keyboard, Webcam, HDMI, Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth, Windows 11 Home
features: 【High Speed RAM And Enormous Space】64GB high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once; 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive allows to fast bootup and data transfer.
【Processor】AMD Ryzen 7 5825U (8 Cores, 16 Threads, 16MB L3 Cache, 2.0 GHz base frequency, up to 4.50 GHz max turbo frequency), AMD Radeon Graphics
【Display】15.6" Touchscreen IPS Micro-Edge Brightview FHD (1920 x 1080) 250-Nits Display
【Tech Specs】1 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C 10Gbps signaling rate, 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate, 1 x HDMI 2.1, 1 x AC smart pin, 1 x Headphone/Microphone Combo Jack, Backlit keyboard

【Operating System】Windows 11 Home - Beautiful, more consistent new design, Great window layout options, Better multi-monitor functionality, Improved performance features, New videogame selection and capabilities, Compatible with Android Apps
description: AMD Ryzen 7 5825U (8 Cores, 16 Threads, 16MB L3 Cache, 2.0 GHz base frequency, up to 4.50 GHz max turbo frequency)
: Up to 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive
1 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C 10Gbps signaling rate
2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate
HP Wide Vision 720p HD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones
